whatIsLingano.question: What is Lingano?
whatIsLingano.answer: Lingano is a modern platform designed to make language learning fast, fun, and effective, with real-time updates and advanced analytics.

freePlan.question: Is there a free plan?
freePlan.answer: Yes! Our Basic plan is free and gives you access to core lessons and daily practice.

upgradeCancel.question: Can I upgrade or cancel anytime?
upgradeCancel.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

teamPlans.question: Do you offer team plans?
teamPlans.answer: Yes, our Team plan is perfect for organizations and includes team management and dedicated support.

frontendDev.title: Frontend Developer
frontendDev.description: We're looking for a talented Frontend Developer to help build beautiful, responsive user interfaces for our language learning platform using React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.
requirements: 3+ years of experience with React and TypeScript
Strong knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript
Experience with state management (Redux, Zustand, or similar)
Familiarity with CSS frameworks (Tailwind CSS preferred)
Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
Understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
Knowledge of version control systems (Git)
Good communication skills in English
benefits: Flexible working hours and remote work options
Free access to all Lingano premium features

backendDev.title: Backend Developer
backendDev.description: Join our backend team to build scalable, secure APIs and services that power our language learning platform. Work with Node.js, PostgreSQL, and cloud technologies.
requirements: 4+ years of experience with Node.js and TypeScript
Strong knowledge of RESTful APIs and GraphQL
Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, Redis)
Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure)
Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Understanding of microservices architecture
Experience with CI/CD pipelines
Good understanding of security best practices
benefits: Flexible working hours and remote work options
Free access to all Lingano premium features

uiUxDesigner.title: UI/UX Designer
uiUxDesigner.description: Shape the user experience of our language learning platform. Create intuitive, engaging designs that make learning languages fun and effective for millions of users.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in UI/UX design
Proficiency in design tools (Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite)
Strong portfolio showcasing web and mobile app designs
Experience with design systems and component libraries
Knowledge of user research and usability testing
Understanding of accessibility principles
Experience with prototyping and user flows
Good communication and presentation skills
benefits: Flexible working hours and remote work options
Latest MacBook Pro and design tools licenses
Free access to all Lingano premium features

devopsEngineer.title: DevOps Engineer
devopsEngineer.description: Help us build and maintain robust, scalable infrastructure that supports millions of language learners worldwide. Work with cloud technologies, automation, and monitoring systems.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in DevOps or Site Reliability Engineering
Strong knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS preferred)
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Proficiency with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Jenkins)
Knowledge of monitoring and logging tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK)
Scripting skills (Bash, Python, or Go)
Understanding of security and compliance requirements
benefits: Flexible working hours and remote work options
Free access to all Lingano premium features
